timeline.message: Added putAllAsync & submitToKeys methods to IMAP

timeline.bodyText: Map Store is another feature of ours, and this sentence seem like talking about it, but actually is not. Can we remove the word store from here to avoid confusion ?
timeline.author: sancar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -863,6 +863,58 @@
                                 long ttl, @Nonnull TimeUnit ttlUnit,
                                 long maxIdle, @Nonnull TimeUnit maxIdleUnit);
 
+    /**
+     * Asynchronously puts the given map entry in the map store.

replies.bodyText: Thanks for your comment. Sure. Shall I add the comment as "Asynchronously puts the given map entry to this map". Will this be ok?
replies.author: santhoshkumarbs
sancar

replies.bodyText: Yes that makes sense. Will make the change. Thanks.
replies.author: santhoshkumarbs
